title: Pinterest font?
content:
hi, anyone know what font was used for the Pinterest logo?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pinterest.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020850/http:/typophile.com/files/pinterest.jpg) | 14.36 KB |
author: adenson

comments.content: The two /e characters are ever so slightly different; combined with the /P which looks like a pin, this suggests to me that it's custom hand-lettering.

Not a font. Logo design by Juan-Carlos Pagan and Michael Deal: [http://www.paganandsharp.com/work/#pinterest](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020850/http:/www.paganandsharp.com/work/#pinterest "http://www.paganandsharp.com/work/#pinterest"), [http://thecaseandpoint.com/2011/05/pinterest/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020850/http:/thecaseandpoint.com/2011/05/pinterest/ "http://thecaseandpoint.com/2011/05/pinterest/")

The two /e characters are ever so marginally distinctive; consolidated with the /P which resembles a pin, this recommends to me that its custom hand-lettering. [buy targeted Pinterest followers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020850/http:/www.socialyup.com/pinterest-followers/)
